title: New genetic marker could help diagnose aggressive prostate cancer

title_detail.value: New genetic marker could help diagnose aggressive prostate cancer

summary: A new link has been found between certain genetic mutations, the aggressiveness of prostate cancer, risk of developing the disease and poorer survival rates of patients.

summary_detail.value: A new link has been found between certain genetic mutations, the aggressiveness of prostate cancer, risk of developing the disease and poorer survival rates of patients.
